trans-unit.source: Displays data from the specified structure or memory address as a list

seg-source.mrk: Displays data from the specified structure or memory address as a list

target.mrk: Displays data from the specified structure or memory address as a list

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: A structure that was created by DllStructCreate(), or memory address to be display its data.

seg-source.mrk: A structure that was created by DllStructCreate(), or memory address to be display its data.

target.mrk: A structure that was created by DllStructCreate(), or memory address to be display its data.

trans-unit.source: [optional] A string representing the structure.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
A string representing the structure.

target.mrk: [optional]
A string representing the structure.

trans-unit.source: If $tStruct is a structure, this parameter can be omitted or be an empty string. In this case, the structure will display as "byte[n]" structure.

seg-source.mrk: If $tStruct is a structure, this parameter can be omitted or be an empty string.
In this case, the structure will display as "byte[n]" structure.

target.mrk: If $tStruct is a structure, this parameter can be omitted or be an empty string.
In this case, the structure will display as "byte[n]" structure.

trans-unit.source: If $tStruct is a memory address, $sStruct should be a string representing the structure, otherwise, the function fail, and @error set to 10.

seg-source.mrk: If $tStruct is a memory address, $sStruct should be a string representing the structure, otherwise, the function fail, and @error set to 10.

target.mrk: If $tStruct is a memory address, $sStruct should be a string representing the structure, otherwise, the function fail, and @error set to 10.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The title of the window, deault is "Structure: ListView Display".

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The title of the window, deault is "Structure:
ListView Display".

target.mrk: [optional]
The title of the window, deault is "Structure:
ListView Display".

trans-unit.source: [optional] The 1-based index or name of the structure member to be selected in the list.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The 1-based index or name of the structure member to be selected in the list.

target.mrk: [optional]
The 1-based index or name of the structure member to be selected in the list.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0 (Default), or an incorrect index or name, the first element of the structure will be selected.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), or an incorrect index or name, the first element of the structure will be selected.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0 (Default), or an incorrect index or name, the first element of the structure will be selected.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The 1-based index of the array in the structure member pointed to by the $iItem parameter to be selected.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
The 1-based index of the array in the structure member pointed to by the $iItem parameter to be selected.

target.mrk: [optional]
The 1-based index of the array in the structure member pointed to by the $iItem parameter to be selected.

trans-unit.source: If $iItem was not defined as an array in the $sStruct, or invalid array index, the element pointed to by the $iItem parameter will be selected.

seg-source.mrk: If $iItem was not defined as an array in the $sStruct, or invalid array index, the element pointed to by the $iItem parameter will be selected.

target.mrk: If $iItem was not defined as an array in the $sStruct, or invalid array index, the element pointed to by the $iItem parameter will be selected.

trans-unit.source: [optional] A set of bit flags that specifies an additional displaying options.

seg-source.mrk: [optional]
A set of bit flags that specifies an additional displaying options.

target.mrk: [optional]
A set of bit flags that specifies an additional displaying options.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be 0, or any combination of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be 0, or any combination of the following values:

target.mrk: This parameter can be 0, or any combination of the following values:

trans-unit.source: 1 - Prevent displaying "

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Prevent displaying "

target.mrk: 1 - Prevent displaying "

trans-unit.source: " and "

seg-source.mrk: " and "

target.mrk: " and "

trans-unit.source: " fields at the beginning and end of the list.

target.mrk: " fields at the beginning and end of the list.

trans-unit.source: 2 - Prevent displaying "

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Prevent displaying "

target.mrk: 2 - Prevent displaying "

trans-unit.source: " fields.

seg-source.mrk: " fields.

target.mrk: " fields.

trans-unit.source: 4 - Prevent displaying "

seg-source.mrk: 4 - Prevent displaying "

target.mrk: 4 - Prevent displaying "

trans-unit.source: " in "Member" column of the list if the structure element has no name.

seg-source.mrk: " in "Member" column of the list if the structure element has no name.

target.mrk: " in "Member" column of the list if the structure element has no name.

trans-unit.source: 8 - Prevent highlighting structure elements that are defined as an array.

seg-source.mrk: 8 - Prevent highlighting structure elements that are defined as an array.

target.mrk: 8 - Prevent highlighting structure elements that are defined as an array.

trans-unit.source: 16 - Prevent perceiving structure elements named "Reserved*" as unused elements.

seg-source.mrk: 16 - Prevent perceiving structure elements named "Reserved*" as unused elements.

target.mrk: 16 - Prevent perceiving structure elements named "Reserved*" as unused elements.

trans-unit.source: 32 - Prevent using double-click to copy values of the structure elements to the clipboard.

seg-source.mrk: 32 - Prevent using double-click to copy values of the structure elements to the clipboard.

target.mrk: 32 - Prevent using double-click to copy values of the structure elements to the clipboard.

trans-unit.source: 64 - Forced to expand structure elements of BYTE[n] and BOOLEAN[n] types (elements of CHAR[n] and WCHAR[n] types always displays as a string).

seg-source.mrk: 64 - Forced to expand structure elements of BYTE[n] and BOOLEAN[n] types (elements of CHAR[n] and WCHAR[n] types always displays as a string).

target.mrk: 64 - Forced to expand structure elements of BYTE[n] and BOOLEAN[n] types (elements of CHAR[n] and WCHAR[n] types always displays as a string).

trans-unit.source: 128 - Forced to display the values of the structure elements in the hexadecimal representation, if possible.

seg-source.mrk: 128 - Forced to display the values of the structure elements in the hexadecimal representation, if possible.

target.mrk: 128 - Forced to display the values of the structure elements in the hexadecimal representation, if possible.

trans-unit.source: 256 - Forced to return error code instead of displaying a message box if a memory access error occurred.

seg-source.mrk: 256 - Forced to return error code instead of displaying a message box if a memory access error occurred.

target.mrk: 256 - Forced to return error code instead of displaying a message box if a memory access error occurred.

trans-unit.source: 512 - Forced to disable checking the read access memory allocated to a given structure.

target.mrk: 512 - Forced to disable checking the read access memory allocated to a given structure.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies whether create a window with "Always On Top" attribute, valid values:

trans-unit.source: True - The window is created with the $WS_EX_TOPMOST extended style (Default).
